description: The ListTypes operation returns a list of types for a specified keyspace. To read keyspace metadata using ListTypes, the IAM principal needs Select action permissions for the system keyspace. To configure the required permissions, see Permissions to view a UDT in the Amazon Keyspaces Developer Guide.

parameters.name: keyspaceName
parameters.description: The name of the keyspace that contains the listed types.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token. To resume pagination, provide the NextToken value as an argument of a subsequent API invocation.

nested_items.name: types
nested_items.description: The list of types contained in the specified keyspace.
